actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The alchemist makes two attacks: one with its punch and one with its bite.

actions.name: Flaming Punch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Scorching Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Flicker of Flames (1/Day)
actions.desc: The alchemist launches a stream of fire at a target within 30 feet. This flame leaps to up to two other targets, each of which must be within 10 feet of the first target. A target can be a creature or an object and can only be targeted by one leap of flame. Each target must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
